mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM t_w_use_water_unit as a
left join ( select use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number,phone_number from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode} and main='1' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_id
left join ( select use_water_unit_Id,bank_of_deposit,bank_account from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and main='1' ) as c on c.use_water_unit_Id=a.id left join ( select id,industry_name as industryName from t_w_quota_info ) as d on d.id=a.industry WHERE a.unit_code_type in (select unit_type_code as unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit_role where person_id=#{userId}) and a.deleted='0' and a.node_code=#{nodeCode}
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%' )
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where mobile_number like '%${mobileNumber}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where contacts like '%${contacts}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where bank_account like '%${bankAccount}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where signed =#{signed} and deleted='0')
and a.abnormal =#{abnormal}
and a.unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'
and a.unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and a.unit_code_type like '%${unitCodeType}%'
and a.responsibility_code like '%${responsibilityCode}%'
and industry =#{industryId}

select id, node_code , unit_code , unit_name , unit_address , industry , zip_name , zip_address , invoice_unit_name , save_unit_type , gisX , gisY , imain , department , area_country , abnormal , abnormal_cause from t_w_use_water_unit where id=#{id} and node_code=#{nodeCode}

select t1.water_meter_code, use_year, now_price, node_code, is_warning, caliber, sector, waterNumber from (select water_meter_code from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where use_water_unit_id = #{id}) t1 left join ( SELECT use_year, water_meter_code, now_price, node_code, is_warning, caliber, sector, ( january_count + february_count + march_count + april_count + may_count + june_count + july_count + august_count + september_count + october_count + october_count + november_count + december_count ) AS waterNumber FROM t_w_water_month_use_data WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} AND use_year = DateName(YEAR,GetDate()) ) t2 on t1.water_meter_code=t2.water_meter_code ORDER BY waterNumber DESC;

SELECT id,industry,sub_industry,product,quota_unit,quota_value,amount,advance_value,common_value,quota_rate, (select industry_name as subIndustryName from t_w_quota_info where id=a.sub_industry)as subIndustryName, (select industry_name as productName from t_w_quota_info where id=a.product) as productName FROM t_w_use_water_quota as a WHERE use_water_unit_id = #{id} and node_code=#{nodeCode} ORDER BY create_time desc

select b.agreement_number as agreementNumber, sBankName = '建行一行', sBankNum = '105651002108', sUnitName = '成都市节约用水监管事务中心', sBankAccount = '51001416108050735062', b.bank_of_deposit as bankOfDeposit, b.people_bank_pay_sys_number as peopleBankPaySysNumber, b.other_bank as bankCode, CASE b.entrust_unit_name WHEN '' THEN a.unit_name WHEN NULL THEN a.unit_name ELSE b.entrust_unit_name END AS accountUnitName, b.bank_account as bankAccount from (select id, unit_name from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode}) as a inner join (select use_water_unit_Id, agreement_number, bank_of_deposit, people_bank_pay_sys_number, other_bank, entrust_unit_name, bank_account from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and signed='0' and bank_account is not null and bank_account !='' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_Id

select * from ( select use_water_unit_Id, bank_account as bankAccount, bank_of_deposit as bankOfDeposit, people_bank_pay_sys_number as peopleBankPaySysNumber, agreement_number as agreementNumber, other_bank as otherBank from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and signed='1' ) as a inner join ( select id from t_w_use_water_unit as b where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode} ) as b on a.use_water_unit_Id =b.id

SELECT distinct CASE a.deleted WHEN 0 THEN '新增' WHEN 1 THEN '注销' END AS userType, unit_code as unitCode, unit_name as unitName, unit_address as unitAddress , contacts, mobileNumber, remark = '' , deleted FROM t_w_use_water_unit as a left join (SELECT use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number as mobileNumber from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where main='1' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_id where a.node_code=#{nodeCode} and a.unit_code_type in (select unit_type_code as unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit_role where person_id=#{userId}) ORDER BY a.deleted

select a.id, a.unit_code as unitCode, a.unit_code_type as unitCodeType, a.unit_code_group as unitCodeGroup, STUFF(( SELECT ',' + water_meter_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_meter WHERE use_water_unit_id=a.id and node_code=#{nodeCode} FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '' ) as waterMeterCode, a.responsibility_code as responsibilityCode, a.unit_name as unitName, d.id as industry, d.industryName, b.contacts, b.mobile_number as mobileNumber, b.phone_number as phoneNumber, save_unit_type as saveUnitType, unit_address as unitAddress, zip_name as zipName, zip_address as zipAddress, department, invoice_unit_name as invoiceUnitName, area_country as areaCountry, gisX , gisY , imain, abnormal , abnormal_cause as abnormalCause, case signed when '1' then '1' when '0' then '0' else '0'end as signed, bank_of_deposit as bankOfDeposit, bank_account as bankAccount, responsibility_code as responsibilityCode, people_bank_pay_sys_number as peopleBankPaySysNumber, agreement_number as agreementNumber, entrust_unit_name as entrustUnitName, focus_user_remark as focusUserRemark, other_bank as otherBank FROM t_w_use_water_unit as a
left join ( select use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number,phone_number from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode} and main='1' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_id
left join ( select use_water_unit_Id,bank_of_deposit,bank_account,signed,people_bank_pay_sys_number,agreement_number,entrust_unit_name,focus_user_remark,other_bank from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and main='1' ) as c on c.use_water_unit_Id=a.id left join ( select id,industry_name as industryName from t_w_quota_info ) as d on d.id=a.industry WHERE a.unit_code_type in (select unit_type_code as unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit_role where person_id=#{userId}) and a.deleted='0' and a.node_code=#{nodeCode}
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%' )
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where mobile_number like '%${mobileNumber}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where contacts like '%${contacts}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where bank_account like '%${bankAccount}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where signed =#{signed} and deleted='0') and signed=#{signed}
and a.abnormal =#{abnormal}
and a.unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'
and a.unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and a.unit_code_type like '%${unitCodeType}%'
and a.responsibility_code like '%${responsibilityCode}%'
and industry =#{industryId}

select t1.*, t2.industry_name as industryName from ( select id, industry, unit_name as unitName, unit_code as unitCode, unit_address as unitAddress, zip_name as zipName, zip_address as zipAddress, unit_code_group as unitCodeGroup, unit_code_type as unitCodeType from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted='0' and unit_code=#{unitCode} and node_code=#{nodeCode} ) as t1 left join ( select id,industry_name from t_w_quota_info ) as t2 on t2.id=t1.industry

select unit_name as unitName, unit_code as unitCode from ( select unit_name,unit_code,unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode} and unit_name like '%${unitName}%' and unit_code_type in( select unit_type_code as unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit_role where person_id=#{userId} ) ) t1
SELECT unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit where node_code=#{nodeCode} GROUP BY unit_code_type

select t1.id, year=#{year}, unit_code , unit_name , unit_address, industry_name from ( select id, unit_code , unit_name , unit_address, industry from t_w_use_water_unit where id=#{id} ) as t1 left join ( select id, industry_name from t_w_quota_info ) as t2 on t2.id=t1.industry
select contacts, mobile_number, phone_number, main from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where deleted='0' and use_water_unit_id=#{id} order by main desc

select yearAndMonth=cast (use_year as varchar(10))+'年'+cast (use_month as varchar(10))+'月', t1.water_meter_code, ROUND(price,2) as price, sector, water_number, water_use_kinds from t_w_water_use_data t1 inner join ( select water_meter_code from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where use_water_unit_id=#{id} ) t2 on t1.water_meter_code=t2.water_meter_code where use_year=#{year}

SELECT id, node_code AS nodeCode, unit_code_type AS parentId, NULL AS orgRank, unit_address AS address, NULL AS officeTel, NULL AS fax, NULL AS contact, NULL AS dutyTel, unit_name AS orgName, create_time AS createTime, NULL AS modifiedTime, remark, NULL AS unitCode, 'org' AS tag, 'null' AS personOrg, 'null' AS POSITION, 'null' AS userName, 'null' AS mobilePhone, 'null' AS parentName, CASE ( SELECT COUNT ( 1 ) FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts t2 WHERE deleted = '0' AND main = '1' AND t2.use_water_unit_id = t1.id ) WHEN 0 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END son FROM t_w_use_water_unit t1 WHERE unit_code_type = #{type} and deleted = '0'
AND (unit_name LIKE '%${condition}%' OR t1.unit_code LIKE '%${condition}%')
